videoDatabase.title: Welcome to Your PMP Exam Prep Journey! (Channel Intro & Course Overview)
videoDatabase.hook: Are you a project manager who's tired of feeling stuck in your career? Ready to unlock global opportunities, increase your earning potential, and join an elite community of certified professionals?
keyPoints: ECO-based structured approach vs random studying
videoDatabase.cta: Subscribe + download study calendar + comment motivation
scriptStructure: PMP Mindset (180-240s): Think like a PMP
videoDatabase.description:

videoDatabase.title: Day 1: PMP Exam 2024 Complete Overview | What You Need to Know
videoDatabase.content: Exam format, domains breakdown, eligibility requirements
learningObjectives: Understand the current PMP exam format and structure
Learn the three domain areas and their weightings
Know the eligibility requirements for taking the exam

videoDatabase.title: Day 2: PMP Study Resources That Actually Work | Avoid These Mistakes
videoDatabase.content: PMBOK vs ECO, recommended materials, what NOT to waste time on
videoDatabase.communityQuestion: What resources are you currently using?
learningObjectives: Distinguish between PMBOK Guide and ECO for exam prep
Identify the most effective study resources

videoDatabase.title: Week 2: Building High-Performance Teams | People Domain (42%)
videoDatabase.content: Team formation stages, diversity benefits, psychological safety
learningObjectives: Understand the stages of team formation
Recognize the benefits of diverse teams
Create psychological safety in team environments

videoDatabase.title: Day 8: Team Ground Rules That Actually Work | Avoid Team Chaos
videoDatabase.content: Ground rule categories, facilitation techniques, enforcement
learningObjectives: Enforce ground rules consistently and fairly
